amendment.description: To exempt procurements of certain services from the limitations regarding service charges imposed for defense procurements made through contracts of other agencies.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3385 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3385 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR S6785-6789) To exempt procurements of certain services from the limitations regarding service charges imposed for defense procurements made through contracts of other agencies.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3385 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3385 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Inhofe.
